sentences.en: An all-inclusive two-week holiday costs around £880 per person.
sentences.cn: 为期两周、包括所有费用的度假大约每人花费880英镑。

sentences.en: Bad weather has caused dozens of flight cancellations over the holiday weekend.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气已经导致这个连假周末数十个航班被取消。

sentences.en: By the end of the holiday I had spent all my money.
sentences.cn: 到假期结束时，我已经花光了自己所有的钱。

sentences.en: Every worker will be entitled to four weeks' paid holiday a year.
sentences.cn: 每位工人每年都能享受4周的带薪休假。

sentences.en: He has rightly interrupted his holiday in Spain to return to London.
sentences.cn: 他马上中止了在西班牙的度假回到伦敦。

sentences.en: He started with a good holiday in Key West, Florida.
sentences.cn: 他先去佛罗里达的基韦斯特岛度了个愉快的假期。

sentences.en: Keen skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
sentences.cn: 滑雪爱好者乐于利用暑期假日去滑雪。

sentences.en: Most common health upsets that spoil a holiday are easily preventable.
sentences.cn: 导致假期泡汤的大多数常见的身体不适都是很容易预防的。

sentences.en: Mr Leach is on holiday and was not available for comment.
sentences.cn: 利奇先生休假了，不方便作出评论。

sentences.en: New Year's Day is a public holiday throughout Britain.
sentences.cn: 元旦是全英国的公众假日。

sentences.en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅游报价和那些度假手册里的价格相去甚远。

sentences.en: The average German will enjoy 40 days' paid holiday this year.
sentences.cn: 今年，德国人将平均享受40天的带薪假期。

sentences.en: The holiday will have done him the world of good.
sentences.cn: 假期定会对他大有好处。

sentences.en: We rang Duncan to ask where he was going on holiday.
sentences.cn: 我们打电话给邓肯，问他要去哪里度假。

sentences.en: Who is footing the bill for her extravagant holiday?
sentences.cn: 谁会为她奢侈的假日买单？

phrases.tran_cn: 快乐的节日；愉快的假期
休假， 放假；度假；有一个假期
假日经济（在节假日由于人们普遍参与各项休闲娱乐活动而引发的消费热潮）
n. 假日酒店；假日旅馆

trans.tran_en: a time of rest from work, school etc
a time of rest from work, school etc
to spend your holiday in a place - used especially in news reports
